Name: Escape From Ithara
About the game: Step into the shoes of Richard Mason, an intrepid adventurer in search of ancient relics, locked in the mysterious Temple of Ithara. To escape, you must solve puzzles, and perhaps escape with your reward. Will you be up to the task? Features - Solve interconnected puzzles to activate the Criptex. - Explore four rooms set in different halls of a forgotten civilization. - Discover more about the history behind the temple - Win the favor of the gods and get your hands on the treasures of Ithara.
